column5: - PIXAR Animation Studios Movies Ranked, from "Toy Story" to "Lightyear" - So, because I only wanted to play the "WALL-E" PS2 game again, I decided to watch all of the Pixar movies again with another perspective, considering I watched most of them as a kid who wasn't interested in films as a whole. UPDATES: - 31/08/2020: "Cars" added. - 02/09/2020: "Ratatouille" added. - 03/09/2020: "Wall-E" added. - 05/09/2020: "Up" added. "Toy Story 3" added. - 11/09/2020: "Cars 2" added. - 30/09/2020: "Brave" added. - 12/07/2021: "Monsters University" added. - 15/07/2021: "Inside Out" added. - 13/03/2022: "Turning Red" added.
